categories: Category:Imperial-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Inflexible was an Imperial-class Star Destroyer.

It was constructed at the Kuat Drive Yards shipyards on Kuat in 3 ABY. Shannon Voorson was able to slice its name along with several other Star Destroyers names and gave it to her cousin, Deen Voorson, a member of the Rebel Alliance.
The Inflexible also hosted the Tir training school, a training center for TIE pilots. Flight Captain T. Alvak was one of the pilots trained on the Inflexible.
